info.description:
Django FeedBack API
===================

Requirements
------------

- django
- django rest framework


Set up
------

Simple `settings.py`::

    INSTALLED_APPS = [
        ...
        'rest_framework',
        'django_feedback_api',
    ]
    EMAIL_HOST = 'smtp.yandex.ru'
    EMAIL_PORT = 587
    EMAIL_USE_TLS = True
    EMAIL_TIMEOUT = 5
    EMAIL_HOST_USER = 'email@example.com'
    DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL = EMAIL_HOST_USER
    SERVER_EMAIL = 'email@example.com'
    EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD = 'PASSWORD'
    MANAGERS = [('Ivanov Ivan', 'email2@example.com')]
    # Optional
    FEEDBACK_SUBJECT = 'Django FeedBack: New feedback'

`urls.py`::

    urlpatterns = [
        ...
        url(r'^api/', include('django_feedback_api.urls')),
    ]

Sent POST to ``http://your.site/api/feedback/``.
info.name: django-feedback-api
info.html_description:
Requirements

  • django
  • django rest framework

Set up

Simple settings.py:

INSTALLED_APPS = [
    ...
    'rest_framework',
    'django_feedback_api',
]
EMAIL_HOST = 'smtp.yandex.ru'
EMAIL_PORT = 587
EMAIL_USE_TLS = True
EMAIL_TIMEOUT = 5
EMAIL_HOST_USER = 'email@example.com'
DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL = EMAIL_HOST_USER
SERVER_EMAIL = 'email@example.com'
EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD = 'PASSWORD'
MANAGERS = [('Ivanov Ivan', 'email2@example.com')]
# Optional
FEEDBACK_SUBJECT = 'Django FeedBack: New feedback'

urls.py:

urlpatterns = [
    ...
    url(r'^api/', include('django_feedback_api.urls')),
]

Sent POST to http://your.site/api/feedback/.
